Html:
Hi,

i am trying to integrate jHtmlArea to a System that has a media library. Also i need the option to include "captions" and "alt" tags.

So i want to change the behaviour of editing images in jHtmlArea. I would like to take away the Event Listener on the img tags and add my own so hovering the images will show buttons that i wil lattatch to functions/dialog boxes.

How can i access those event listeners and the behaviour?
